NPC.name: Suri
NPC.description: This ochre scaled and tann skinned lizardgirl looks notably younger and shorter than the others coming in a shade under 5 feet in height. She looks to be in whatever the lizard equivalent of the teenage years is with a bright smile and a pair of loose wraps around hips and chest instead of the usual tunic.

missText.text: Suri's punch fails to connect with TARGET

hitText.text: Suri hits TARGET for VALUE points of damage
